requirement: "C-1-3] MUST NOT remove or modify NotoColorEmoji.tff in the system image. (It is acceptable to add a new emoji font to override emoji in NotoColorEmoji.tff) SHOULD support the skin tone and diverse family emojis as specified in the Unicode Technical Report #51. If device implementations include an IME, they: SHOULD provide an input method to the user for these emoji characters. Android includes support to render Myanmar fonts. Myanmar has several non-Unicode compliant fonts, commonly known as “Zawgyi,” for rendering Myanmar languages. If device implementations include support for Burmese, they: *"
